screenshots.caption: CartWindow expanded and holding position on screen

name: DynamicCartForModifiedShop
short_description:
motivation:
cart-content shall be shown in a effective way, f.e. for resellers or customers who want to have a list of products in theyr cart, and need to work with that, some nice gui gimmics aside.... just to have somethin different .....midigate the need for "continue shopping". or be dropped in your cart after you add something .... and have this action visually in an intutive way.....and it should not reinvent everything, but reuse the content, by not modifiing the source if possible....

tech:
a "cart-window", which is a ajax-loaded clone of shopping_cart.php  that can be positioned somewhere on screen and preserves the state through page-reloads using kendo-web

features:
- persistent state of the window trouhg page-reloads
- moves articles to cart with animation
- also for "add2cart" from prouct-listings


it uses jquery and kendoui.web
